snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo issued an executive order on Saturday directing New York State agencies to “adhere to the spirit” of a bill he vetoed a day earlier.
abstract: Gov Andrew M Cuomo issues executive order repealing his own veto of bill that would expedite appeals under Freedom of Information Law; reversal occurs within period of two days.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo issued an executive order on Saturday directing New York State agencies to “adhere to the spirit” of a bill he vetoed a day earlier.

headline.main: In Reversal, Governor Cuomo Moves to Support Faster Action on Information Requests
headline.print_headline: In Reversal, Cuomo Moves to Support Faster Action on Information Requests
